price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, mun aika zuwa Samũdãwa da ɗan'uwansu, Salihu (ya ce), "Ku bauta wa Allah." Sai gã su ƙungiyõyi biyu sunã ta husũma.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمۡ فَرِيقَانِ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani uʿ'budū al-laha fa-idhā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūna
